amendment.description: Amendment authorizes the Army Corps to perform environmental restoration activities at Liberty State Park in Jersey City, New Jersey, provided a favorable report is issued by the Chief of Engineers.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 109-160. Amendment provides an authorization for the environmental restoration project in Liberty State Park, New Jersey, contingent on a favorable Chief's report being issued for the project prior to December 31 of this year.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Menendez amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Menendez.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Menendez amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
